mapper.update:
update t_qycftj a set a.qycftjid=a.qycftjid
where 1=1
mapper.select:
select a.qycftjid qycftjid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.tjrq tjrq,a.dsjgdm dsjgdm,a.dsjgmc dsjgmc,a.fxjdm fxjdm,a.fxjmc fxjmc,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc,a.gxdwdm gxdwdm,a.csbm csbm,a.csmc csmc,a.jgcs jgcs,a.fmcs fmcs,a.tdcs tdcs,a.zjcs zjcs,a.qtfmcs qtfmcs from t_qycftj a where 1=1
order by a.qycftjid

select a.qycftjid qycftjid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.tjrq tjrq,a.dsjgdm dsjgdm,a.dsjgmc dsjgmc,a.fxjdm fxjdm,a.fxjmc fxjmc,a.gxdwmc gxdwmc,a.gxdwdm gxdwdm,a.csbm csbm,a.csmc csmc,a.jgcs jgcs,a.fmcs fmcs,a.tdcs tdcs,a.zjcs zjcs,a.qtfmcs qtfmcs from t_qycftj a where 1=1
order by a.qycftjid

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE gxdwdm, PCS.DEPARTNAME gxdwmc, NVL(JGCS.JGCS,'0')+ NVL(FMCS.FMCS,'0')+ NVL(TDCS.TDCS,'0')+NVL(ZJCS.ZJCS,'0')+ NVL(QTCS.QTCS,'0') xiaoji, NVL(JGCS.JGCS,'0') jgcs, NVL(FMCS.FMCS,'0') fmcs, NVL(TDCS.TDCS,'0') tdcs, NVL(ZJCS.ZJCS,'0') zjcs, NVL(QTCS.QTCS,'0') qtfmcs, '' csbm, '' csmc
from (SELECT DEPT.DEPARTCODE, DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE, DEPT.DEPARTNAME, DEPT.NODEORDER FROM T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #{gxdwlevel} AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE #{gxdwbm} order by dept.nodeorder ) PCS,
(SELECT SUBSTR(qycf.ssdwbm, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) ssdwbm, COUNT(1) JGCS FROM t_qycf qycf, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #{gxdwlevel} AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE #{gxdwbm} AND qycf.ssdwbm LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%' AND qycf.djsj BETWEEN #{qssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{jzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND qycf.cfjgdm ='1'
GROUP BY SUBSTR(qycf.ssdwbm, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE))) JGCS,
(SELECT SUBSTR(qycf.ssdwbm, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) ssdwbm, COUNT(1) FMCS FROM t_qycf qycf, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #{gxdwlevel} AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE #{gxdwbm} AND qycf.ssdwbm LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%' AND qycf.djsj BETWEEN #{qssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{jzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND (qycf.cfjgdm ='2' or qycf.cfjgdm ='3' or qycf.cfjgdm ='4')
GROUP BY SUBSTR(qycf.ssdwbm, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE))) FMCS,
(SELECT SUBSTR(qycf.ssdwbm, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) ssdwbm, COUNT(1) TDCS FROM t_qycf qycf, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #{gxdwlevel} AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE #{gxdwbm} AND qycf.ssdwbm LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%' AND qycf.djsj BETWEEN #{qssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{jzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND (qycf.cfjgdm ='5' or qycf.cfjgdm ='6')
GROUP BY SUBSTR(qycf.ssdwbm, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE))) TDCS,
(SELECT SUBSTR(qycf.ssdwbm, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) ssdwbm, COUNT(1) ZJCS FROM t_qycf qycf, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #{gxdwlevel} AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE #{gxdwbm} AND qycf.ssdwbm LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%' AND qycf.djsj BETWEEN #{qssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{jzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND qycf.cfjgdm ='7'
GROUP BY SUBSTR(qycf.ssdwbm, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE))) ZJCS,
(SELECT SUBSTR(qycf.ssdwbm, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) ssdwbm, COUNT(1) QTCS FROM t_qycf qycf, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #{gxdwlevel} AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE #{gxdwbm} AND qycf.ssdwbm LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%' AND qycf.djsj BETWEEN #{qssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{jzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND qycf.cfjgdm ='9'
GROUP BY SUBSTR(qycf.ssdwbm, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE))) QTCS
WHERE PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = JGCS.ssdwbm(+) AND PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = FMCS.ssdwbm(+) AND PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = TDCS.ssdwbm(+) AND PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = ZJCS.ssdwbm(+) AND PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = QTCS.ssdwbm(+) )

SELECT PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE gxdwdm, PCS.DEPARTNAME gxdwmc, NVL(JGCS.JGCS,'0')+ NVL(FMCS.FMCS,'0')+ NVL(TDCS.TDCS,'0')+NVL(ZJCS.ZJCS,'0')+ NVL(QTCS.QTCS,'0') xiaoji, NVL(JGCS.JGCS,'0') jgcs, NVL(FMCS.FMCS,'0') fmcs, NVL(TDCS.TDCS,'0') tdcs, NVL(ZJCS.ZJCS,'0') zjcs, NVL(QTCS.QTCS,'0') qtfmcs, '' csbm, '' csmc
from (SELECT DEPT.DEPARTCODE, DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE, DEPT.DEPARTNAME, DEPT.NODEORDER FROM T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTCODE = #{gxdwbmall} order by dept.nodeorder ) PCS,
(SELECT qycf.ssdwbm ssdwbm, COUNT(1) JGCS FROM t_qycf qycf WHERE qycf.ssdwbm = #{gxdwbmall} AND qycf.djsj BETWEEN #{qssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{jzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND qycf.cfjgdm ='1'
GROUP BY qycf.ssdwbm ) JGCS,
(SELECT qycf.ssdwbm ssdwbm, COUNT(1) FMCS FROM t_qycf qycf WHERE qycf.ssdwbm = #{gxdwbmall} AND qycf.djsj BETWEEN #{qssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{jzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND (qycf.cfjgdm ='2' or qycf.cfjgdm ='3' or qycf.cfjgdm ='4')
GROUP BY qycf.ssdwbm ) FMCS,
(SELECT qycf.ssdwbm ssdwbm, COUNT(1) TDCS FROM t_qycf qycf WHERE qycf.ssdwbm = #{gxdwbmall} AND qycf.djsj BETWEEN #{qssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{jzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND (qycf.cfjgdm ='5' or qycf.cfjgdm ='6')
GROUP BY qycf.ssdwbm ) TDCS,
(SELECT qycf.ssdwbm ssdwbm, COUNT(1) ZJCS FROM t_qycf qycf WHERE qycf.ssdwbm = #{gxdwbmall} AND qycf.djsj BETWEEN #{qssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{jzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND qycf.cfjgdm ='7'
GROUP BY qycf.ssdwbm ) ZJCS,
(SELECT qycf.ssdwbm ssdwbm, COUNT(1) QTCS FROM t_qycf qycf WHERE qycf.ssdwbm = #{gxdwbmall} AND qycf.djsj BETWEEN #{qssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{jzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND qycf.cfjgdm ='9'
GROUP BY qycf.ssdwbm ) QTCS
WHERE PCS.DEPARTCODE = JGCS.ssdwbm(+) AND PCS.DEPARTCODE = FMCS.ssdwbm(+) AND PCS.DEPARTCODE = TDCS.ssdwbm(+) AND PCS.DEPARTCODE = ZJCS.ssdwbm(+) AND PCS.DEPARTCODE = QTCS.ssdwbm(+)
